# blue-bundler-decoder

```bash
yarn decode [data]
```

or

```bash
yarn decode [call1] [call2] [call3] ...
```

exemple:

```bash
yarn decode 
```

## Simple

add the `--simple` flag **in the end** to only have function name and args:

```bash
yarn decode [data] --simple
```

## Output

Output will be available in `output/` directory
